definition: Yuhuan county in Taizhou 台州[Tai1 zhou1], Zhejiang
ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in
Yuhuan county in Taizhou 台州[Tai1 zhou1], Zhejiang

Yang Yuhuan or Yang Guifei 楊貴妃|杨贵妃[Yang2 Gui4 fei1] (719-756), famous Tang beauty, consort of Emperor Xuanzhong 唐玄宗[Tang2 Xuan2 zong1], blamed for extravagance and killed as a scapegoat during the An-Shi Rebellion 安史之亂|安史之乱[An1 Shi3 zhi1 Luan4]

sentences.english: The Lord went down into the water and came up with Mallika Sherawat .
sentences.chinese: 上帝跳進河裏然後帶出來楊玉環。

sentences.english: Yuhuan found a black, also with Phoenix after, very beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 發現一隻黑玉環，還帶後鳳，挺漂亮。

sentences.english: Yang Guifei , originally named Yang Yuhuan, was one of the Four Beauties in ancient China.
sentences.chinese: 楊貴妃，小名玉環，中國古代四大美人之一。

sentences.english: There is only black dragon in Yuhuan submitted to the meat, and there is something wrong with the eyes.
sentences.chinese: 有隻黑玉環交到肉龍里了，有隻眼睛有毛病了。

sentences.english: Don't dance, don't you see, Yuhuan Feiyan is dust.
sentences.chinese: 君莫舞，君不見，玉環飛燕皆塵土。

sentences.english: Qian Xiaochun was born in Yuhuan, Zhejiang in 1947.
sentences.chinese: 錢小純，1947年出生於浙江玉環，原籍杭州。

sentences.english: There was a beautiful girl named Yang Yuhuan who was selected into the palace in Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 唐朝開元年間，有一美貌女子叫楊玉環，被選進宮來。

sentences.english: This is the hot spring bathing pool Li Longji gave his concubine Yang Yuhuan.
sentences.chinese: 這就是李隆基送給妃子楊玉環的溫泉浴池。

definition: see 楊貴妃|杨贵妃[Yang2 Gui4 fei1]
clear as ice and clean as jade (idiom); spotless/irreproachable/incorruptible
to cross (a road, an ocean etc)/to cut across
see 櫻桃小嘴|樱桃小嘴[ying1 tao2 xiao3 zui3]
lit. as round as pearls and as smooth as jade (idiom)/fig. elegant and polished (of singing or writing)
to have bright eyes and white teeth
